summary: THE CAR DIDN'T TURN ON.  I CALLED THE TOWING COMPANY THINKING THAT IT WAS THE BATTERY, BUT THEY CONFIRMED THAT IT WAS NOT THE BATTERY.  I TOWED THE CAR TO MY MECHANIC. I  DID SEARCH THE INTERNET AND THOUSANDS OF THIS MODEL OWNER HAS EXPERIENCED THIS PROBLEM.  MERCEDES BENZ SHOULD ISSUE A RECALL IMMEDIATELY.
